seo.title: SignUp
seo.description: Sign up for a free account to get started with programming with 4Geeks

checkout.title: Code will set you free
checkout.description: The path to professional freedom is highly mentored, live and together.

free_trial_multiple_payments: {{description}} and then {{numPayments}} payments of {{currency}}{{firstPrice}} or {{currency}}{{oneTimePrice}} one time
fixed-price-disclaimer: Fixed price discounts will only be applied to the first month when financed for more than one month. Percentage discounts will be applied to all months.
plan-is-ready: You're almost ready! To finish, press the blue button below that says 'Start Learning'.
checking-coinbase-payment-confirmation: We're checking the confirmation of your cryptocurrency payment with Coinbase
this-may-take-few-seconds: This may take a few seconds...
error-coinbase-payment: There was an error with Coinbase payment
coinbase-status-error: We had a problem confirming your payment with Coinbase. Wait a few seconds and contact support if you don't get your subscription.
save-card-for-later: Save my credit card for later
one_payment_description: Access hundreds of exercises, projects tutorials to develop and courses in the most wanted technologies
monthly_payment_description: Access hundreds of exercises, projects tutorials to develop and courses in the most wanted technologies
quarterly_payment_description: Access hundreds of exercises, projects tutorials to develop and courses in the most wanted technologies
half_yearly_payment_description: Access hundreds of exercises, projects tutorials to develop and courses in the most wanted technologies
yearly_payment_description: Access hundreds of exercises, projects tutorials to develop and courses in the most wanted technologies
financing_many_months_description: You will pay {{currency}}{{monthly_price}} for {{many_months}} months and get access hundreds of exercises, projects tutorials to develop and courses in the most wanted technologies
in-waiting-list-title: You are in out waiting list
signup-thanks-text: Thanks for signing up to try 4Geeks. We'll be in touch when your seat is ready
your-address: Give us your address to find your new class
addres-info: We are not storing your address, but we will use this information to offer the best possible dates and schedules to study.
email-info: We will use it to give you access to your account.
phone-info: We will contact you via phone call only if necessary. (optional)
already-adquired-plan-description: You've had already acquired this plan before, you can't buy it again. Click below to see your subscriptions.
coupon-error: This coupon is not valid or it has expired

cta.lesson: Join cohort to get access to this lesson
cta.exercise: Join cohort to get access to this exercise
cta.project: Join cohort to get access to this project
cta.generic: Join cohort to get access to this {{type}}

join-cohort.description: Click the button below to join the cohort and access the program's content.

card-declined: The card was declined, please try again with another card or contact your bank
payment-error: An unexpected error occurred during the payment process, please contact support

info.will-pay-monthly: You will pay ${{price}} dollars {{qty_months}} times, for a total of ${{total_amount}}. The first payment will be today and the next payment will be {{next_month}}.
info.will-pay-month: You will pay ${{price}} dollars {{qty_months}} times, for a total of ${{total_amount}}.
info.will-pay-now: You will pay ${{price} right now, no other charges apply in the future.
info.will-pay-per-month: You will subscribe and pay ${{price}} dollars every month
info.will-pay-per-quarter: You will subscribe and pay ${{price}} dollars every quarter
info.will-pay-per-half-year: You will subscribe and pay ${{price}} dollars every half year
info.will-pay-per-year: You will subscribe and pay ${{price}} dollars every year

validators.exp-min: Please specify a valid expiration date
validators.invalid-phone: Please specify a valid phone number
validators.receive-information: I agree to receive information in my email, WhatsApp, and/or other channels about coding workshops, events, courses, and other marketing materials. We'll never share your contact information and you can easily opt out at any moment.

no-date-available: We currently have no dates available for the location entered
agree-terms-and-conditions: By signing up, you agree to the

alert-message.title: Already a member?
alert-message.description: It seems that you already have an account in 4geeks.com
alert-message.message3: forgot password to get a new one
alert-message.validate-email-description: We sent a confirmation email to: {{email}}, please check your email and click on the confirmation link.
alert-message.email-sent-to: We sent you a confirmation email to {{email}}!
alert-message.email-already-sent: You have a pending invitation sent less than 1 day ago, check your email
alert-message.already-renewed-description: This subscription cycle was already paid on {{paidDate}}. Your next payment is due on {{nextDate}}.
alert-message.missing-subscription-id-description: Please provide either subscription_id or plan_financing_id in the URL
alert-message.multiple-subscription-ids-description: Please provide only one ID: either subscription_id or plan_financing_id, not both
alert-message.missing-renewal-window-description: Please provide early_renewal_window_days parameter in the URL
alert-message.too-early-to-renew-description: You can renew starting from {{startDate}}. Your next payment is due on {{nextDate}}.
alert-message.subscription-cancelled-status-descriptio: This subscription cannot be renewed because it's cancelled.
alert-message.subscription-expired-status-description: This subscription is expired; please contact support.

alert-message-validate-email.title: Verify email
alert-message-validate-email.description: You haven't validated your email yet, login to your email account and look for the invitation
alert-message-validate-email.description2: Don't forget to check your email spam inbox as well!

coupon-not-valid: This coupon is invalid or doesn't work for the {{plan}} plan. If you think this is an error, contact support@4geeks.com.

consumables.consumable-event-not-available: This event is not available for your subscription
consumables.consumable-mentorship-not-available: This mentorship is not available for your subscription
consumables.consumable-compilations-not-available: Compilations are not available for your subscription

select-service-of-plan.title: Which experience do you want to upgrade?
select-service-of-plan.description: We have plans with mentoring available for you, select one before continuing:
select-service-of-plan.subscription-not-found-description: The subscription you're trying to renew was not found. Please check the link and try again.
select-service-of-plan.subscription-not-yours-description: This subscription doesn't belong to you. You can only renew your own subscriptions.
select-service-of-plan.subscription-invalid-status-description: This subscription cannot be renewed because it's not active. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.
select-service-of-plan.subscription-expired-description: This subscription has expired and cannot be renewed. Please contact support for assistance.
select-service-of-plan.no-plan-found-for-service: You don't have any subscription related to the following services:

basic-plan.title: Try the self-paced experience for free and decide later
basic-plan.hook-message: Try the self-paced experience for free and decide later
basic-plan.description: Start learning and discover our amazing content and benefits

features.description: Hundreds of interactive exercises, projects, and lessons are available thanks to LearnPack, our interactive engine.
We offer a diverse range of courses across various technologies, providing you with opportunities to enhance your existing skills or delve into new ones.
Try our internally trained AI models which can constantly review your code and give you feedback, advice as you code, and more.

premium-plan.title: Learn at your own pace with feedback and live events
premium-plan.hook-message: Learn at your own pace with feedback and live events
premium-plan.description: All the content you need to become a hireable developer

features.description: We have many workshops and Live Events hosted by experts every week.
Our internally trained AI models will constantly review your code and give you feedback, advice as you code and more. Plus we have a technical support chat 24/7.
We have many workshops and Live Events hosted by experts every week.
Earn verifiable certificates as you complete each of the courses.
